product_name: New England 6mm Accessory Cord - Package of 30 ft.
long_description: Suitable for general lashing and making prusik slings, the multipurpose New England 6mm accessory cord is engineered to be strong and supple. Kernmantle construction features a durable braided sheath for strength, abrasion resistance and low stretch. For proper use, consult a climbing reference such as,. Package of 30 ft.
